title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Southern Lebanon: Latest Military Updates”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Documentation: Attack on a Hezbollah terrorist and destruction of a military structure where terrorists operated; IDF continues to strike in southern Lebanon.

Combat aircraft attacked earlier today two military structures where terrorists were operating in the areas of Aitaroun and Ayta ash-Shab in southern Lebanon, alongside military structures and terror infrastructure in the areas of Marjeyoun, Hula, and Kfar Kila in southern Lebanon.

Following alerts that were activated in Ma’ayan Baruch at 17:31, five launches were identified that crossed from Lebanese territory and fell in open areas; there are no casualties.

Following alerts activated at 16:23 in Ramat Naftali, one launch was identified that crossed from Lebanese territory and fell in an open area; there are no casualties. Additionally, following alerts activated at 17:03 in Dov Aviv, one launch was identified that fell in an open area; there are no casualties.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3SeeFJ5
